channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes that cannot be avoided on corner, 19th April
item.description:
On left side of road as you are heading for air balloon roundabout in 30 mph zone. A good stretch of this road is uneven and hazardous

item.title: McDonald’s waste and NOS canisters, 19th April
item.description:
Bagged up the litter and piled up some canisters for collection. If you cross reference the McDonald’s order number with the address on the envelope you may be able to pin point the culprit and impose a fine.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenways, Barnwood, Gloucester
